summary.span: 提供存取 tablet 畫筆的一般資訊。

span.span: Provides access to general information about a tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 這個範例假設有名`textBox1`，且， ，和事件都已連接至事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以確保`element`接收手寫筆事件，即使游標離開項目的界限。Use the method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds. 若要放開手寫筆時，呼叫具有設定為。To release the stylus, call with the set to . 方法會傳回`false`如果`element`不可見的或已啟用。The method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 這個範例假設有名`textBox1`，且， ，和事件都已連接至事件處理常式。This example assumes there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 將附加的事件實作為路由事件。implements attached events as routed events. 基本上，附加的事件都[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用來參考處理的事件未這麼做的物件本身會定義事件的語言概念。Attached events are, fundamentally, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept used to reference events that are handled on objects that do not, themselves, define events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]進一步擴充附加的事件的功能，讓它可以周遊的路由。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件並沒有直接處理語法在程式碼若要附加的程式碼中的路由事件處理常式，使用指定的新增 \* 處理常式方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更的背景色彩當會擷取並釋放手寫筆事件。The following example demonstrates how to change the background color of a when the captures and releases stylus events. 此範例假設是文字方塊，稱為`textBox1`，且和事件都已連接至事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a textbox called `textBox1`, and that the and events are connected to event handlers. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#10)]

[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 將附加的事件實作為路由事件。implements attached events as routed events. 基本上，附加的事件是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用來參考處理的事件未這麼做的物件本身會定義事件的語言概念。An attached event is, fundamentally, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept used to reference events that are handled on objects that do not, themselves, define events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 進一步擴充附加的事件的功能，讓它可以周遊的路由。further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件並沒有直接處理語法在程式碼若要附加的程式碼中的路由事件處理常式，使用指定的新增 \* 處理常式方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷哪些手寫筆位於其上方的項目。The following example demonstrates how to determine which element the stylus is positioned over. 這個範例假設有名`textBox1`，而且事件所連接的事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and that the event is connected to the event handler. summary.span: 使用者按下手寫筆上其中一個按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user presses one of the buttons on the stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 將附加的事件實作為路由事件。implements attached events as routed events. 基本上，附加的事件是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用來參考處理的事件未這麼做的物件本身會定義事件的語言概念。An attached event is, fundamentally, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept used to reference events that are handled on objects that do not, themselves, define events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 進一步擴充附加的事件的功能，讓它可以周遊的路由。further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件並沒有直接處理語法在程式碼若要附加的程式碼中的路由事件處理常式，使用指定的新增 \* 處理常式方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何顯示快顯功能表時，使用者按下手寫筆的桶狀按鈕。The following example demonstrates how to show a shortcut menu when the user presses the barrel button on a stylus. 這個範例假設有名`textBox1`，和稱為`textBoxContextMenu`，而且事件所連接的事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and a called `textBoxContextMenu`, and that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 進一步擴充附加的事件的功能，讓它可以周遊的路由。further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件並沒有直接處理語法在程式碼若要附加的程式碼中的路由事件處理常式，使用指定的新增 \* 處理常式方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更的色彩當手寫筆游標進入和離開其邊界。The following example demonstrates how to change the color of a when the stylus cursor enters and leaves its bounds. 這個範例假設有名`button1`而且和事件都已連接的事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `button1` and that the and events are connected to the event handlers. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可能需要判斷資料指標所在的項目。Applications may need to determine the element on which the cursor is located. 如果應用程式使用動畫，方法可能會傳回已從資料指標之下移出的項目。If the application uses animation, the method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor. 呼叫若要確定傳回適當的項目。Call to be sure that returns the proper element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得游標下的項目。The following example demonstrates how to get the element that is under the cursor. 呼叫可確保傳回正確的項目。Calling ensures that returns the correct element.
